sentences.english: Next, there was a knock on the door of the village shoe-maker.
sentences.chinese: 然后，村子的鞋匠听到了敲门声。

sentences.english: All part of a big conspiracy on the part of the cobblers .
sentences.chinese: 这全是那些修鞋匠阴谋的一部分而已。

sentences.english: You'll need to take your shoes to the cobblers to have them mended.
sentences.chinese: 你得把鞋子拿到补鞋匠那里修一下。

sentences.english: He gave the cobbler a gold coin and had the man show him Cassim's house.
sentences.chinese: 他给了补鞋匠一枚金币，叫他指出凯辛的住处。

sentences.english: Then she went to an old cobbler near the gates of the town.
sentences.chinese: 然后她跑去找靠近镇上城门口的一位老补鞋匠。

sentences.english: Your turn now, cobbler . How many people brought you their old shoes to mend this month?
sentences.chinese: 现在我问你，鞋匠，这个月有多少人到你那里修鞋呢？

sentences.english: So decent and smart are we, We no more need cobblers be.
sentences.chinese: 我们又体面又漂亮，我们是别无所求的小鞋匠。

sentences.english: The son of a Canterbury shoemaker, he earned a degree from Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 他是坎特伯里一鞋匠的儿子，曾在剑桥大学取得学位。

sentences.english: We come not again for we're cobblers no more.
sentences.chinese: 但是以后不会来了，因为我们不再是鞋匠了。

sentences.english: His father, a shoemaker, had died, and his mother had married again.
sentences.chinese: 他的修鞋匠的父亲死了，母亲改嫁了。

sentences.english: Get expert tips and advice on cobblers and shoe care in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 在这个自由获取视频专家贴士鞋匠和鞋护理和咨询。

sentences.english: Upholsterers, Tailors, Shoe Repairers, Jewellers and Related Occupations.
sentences.chinese: 家具装饰，裁缝，鞋匠，珠宝商和相关职业。

sentences.english: The shoemaker carefully examined the leather before starting to cut out the uppers.
sentences.chinese: 鞋匠仔细察看了这张皮子以后才开始裁剪鞋帮儿。

sentences.english: Let the cobbler stick to his last.
sentences.chinese: 让补鞋匠补鞋直到最后吧。

sentences.english: The cobbler's wife is the worst shod.
sentences.chinese: 补鞋匠的妻子没好鞋穿。

definition: hooped barrel/to handmake a wooden barrel
